title: Leveling Up With Everyone!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>....28, 29, 30, alright, we’re done!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hyaaah! I’m so tired~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Good work, Chika-chan. Your breathing has become a lot better than the last time we trained together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh, really? That’s good to hear~, maybe it’s because of the training we’ve been doing recently.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>A training you’ve been doing recently?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah. We’ve been doing a training plan that Dia-san made a while ago. It seems that she came up with it together with Umi-chan, and it’s really tough, you know~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>But I may have built up some stamina thanks to that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Heeeh, isn’t that amazing. Hey, Chika-chan. If you don’t mind, can you tell me about that training? I want to try it for Nijigaku as well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Of course! It’ll be great if we can all train and level up together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, we’re rivals but friends, after all, right♪ I’m looking forward to that training.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
